metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2523 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The dnp3_al_process_object function in epan/dissectors/packet-dnp.c in the DNP3 dissector in Wireshark 1.12.x before 1.12.10 and 2.0.x before 2.0.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2523` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwireshark6 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwiretap5 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwsutil6 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
tshark - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-common - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-gtk - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-qt - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.2+ga16e22e-1').
